newsitem.title: UK: BOE sets 5-23/32 pct rate on UK money market repos.
newsitem.headline: BOE sets 5-23/32 pct rate on UK money market repos.

text.p: The Bank of England set an unchanged rate of 5-23/32 percent on repos and secured loan facilities starting on Thursday and maturing in two and four weeks' time.
The two-week repos will mature on September 19, 20 and 23. The four-week repos will mature on October 10, 11 and 14.
The rate is the same as that currently applying to the Bank's day-to-day money market repos.
The Bank will announce the amounts to be allotted in the repos at around 1215 GMT.
